About This Property
BROKER FEE PAID - *OFFERING ONE MONTH FREE* Introducing 48 brand-new luxury rentals in the heart of vibrant,Jamaica Plain,offering one bedrooms,one-bedroom plus dens,and two-bedroom apartments. Spacious living areas feature floor-to-ceiling windows and hardwood flooring throughout. Additional amenities include on-site parking,bike storage,and professional management. Whether you're looking for nature,culture,or entertainment,Jamaica Plain has something for everyone. Pet-friendly.
